data.text: @qewperp @CollignonPeter Once the government started giving them messaging they liked they started trusting again unfortunately. People are fickle.
@CollignonPeter @qewperp I’m not. Our government messaging is inept and our media is dangerous. It took me 34 years and a pandemic to get past being a conspiracy theorist anti-vaxxer.

@CollignonPeter I am curious as to why you are surprised that the numbers of dunces and ignoramus  is so high in Australia, go for a walk around where your fellow Australians converse in a pub,the beach , at the races or cricket or footy ,at car racing and listen quitely to the conversation.
@CollignonPeter Can you please provide a link to the questions.  Thank you.

@EddieChalk @CollignonPeter Oh you're talking about the fake one saying it didn't work that had to be pulled from the medical journals.
Until you understand what it does as a part of multi drug therapy you will have no clue.

@longfacehorse @Nodeling1 @CollignonPeter Yes, you are absolutely right. Didn't take off the extra 2 zeroes when going to percent. I thought that looked extremely small, but then I rationalised it because covid is not often in the top 10 causes of death
